1.0.15.name: wordpress/nucaptcha
1.0.15.description:
Publishers have a choice between old style, static CAPTCHA security that is easily broken and frustrating to users OR NuCaptcha.

NuCaptcha Free is a free, easy to use, service for Wordpress users.

NuCaptcha Free provides a complete video CAPTCHA solution with:

  • High quality video NuCaptchas
  • Enhanced security
  • Greater usability for users
  • Better conversions
  • Piece of mind

Add captchas to your contact forms, registration pages, comments, login and password reset forms. The NuCaptcha WordPress plugin is fully compatible with BuddyPress and Contact Form 7.
